description:
Hi, my name is Alessia.
I'll graduate in Computer Engineering @Polytechnic University of Turin this March.

From 2017 to the beginning of 2019 I took a pause from my studies and moved to Ireland, where I started working, lately as a Web Implementation Specialist for the Google Tag Team in Dublin. Last January I decided to come back to Italy in order to complete my studies. In the last months of University I worked as a Front End Developer (Vue.js).

In my spare time I enjoy taking online programming courses and writing about what I've learned. I'm really passionate about development, web development in particular.

projects.name: Magic Ball
projects.description: Classic 8 ball that answer to your "yes" or "no" questions.

projects.name: Pomodoro Clock
projects.description: Timer that allows to alternate study sessions and breaks.

projects.name: Drum Machine
projects.description: Drum pads that can be played with the mouse or the keyboard, the name of the track played is shown on a display.

projects.name: React Calculator
projects.description: Calculator that handles the 4 standard operations (sum, subtraction, division, multiplication) for both integers and floating-point numbers.

projects.name: Random Quote Machine
projects.description: Web page that returns via API from 'Quotes on Design' a series of random quotes. They can be shared on Twitter clicking on the related Button.

projects.name: Markdown Previewer
projects.description: Responsive web page that allow to Markdown the content inserted in the editor and visualize it in the Preview Container.
This was my first project. I tried to replicate a game that my father plays on paper.
